subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Carlos Tévez scored on a diving header in the 70th minute, and Manchester United beat visiting Roma, 1-0, to reach the European Champions League semifinals. Manchester United won the home-and-home series, 3-0 on aggregate, and will play Barcelona, which defeated visiting Schalke, 1-0, on a goal by Yaya Toure in the 43rd minute and advanced, 2-0 on aggregate. Liverpool will play Chelsea in the other semifinal. The three English clubs were in the final four last year with A. C. Milan, which won the title.
